Title: Children's examination day
Publisher: Hebei renmin chubanshe (河北人民出版社)
Notes: The poster hanging on the back wall is "Realize [the policy of] marrying late and birth control to liberate the labor power of women" by Zhong Shijia (仲世家) and the Liaoning Provincial Birth Control Office (辽宁省计划生育办公室), published in 1975.
